books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A hired killer and a woman he kidnapped join forces to elude the F.B.I. agents and others who are searching for her corrupt brother.
books.name: STING

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Tense turning points for three couples at a backyard barbecue gone wrong.
books.name: TRULY MADLY GUILTY

books.author: by Susan Elizabeth Phillips
books.description: A former quarterback hires a detective to scope out the employees at his high-end nightclub.
books.name: FIRST STAR I SEE TONIGHT

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett must stop a team of assassins prowling the Upper West Side.
books.name: BULLSEYE

books.author: by Tijan
books.description: Summer heads to college with designs on her stepbrother, but his fraternity mate turns her head instead.
books.name: ANTI-STEPBROTHER

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Ruby ends her estrangement from her famous advice-guru mother in order to write a tell-all.
books.name: SUMMER ISLAND

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: by Janet Evanovich and Phoef Sutton
books.description: The first of a new series featuring Emerson Knight, an eccentric millionaire, and Riley Moon, an analyst at a mega-bank.
books.name: CURIOUS MINDS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: The killer who terrorized Eliza as a teenager is suddenly free on a legal loophole, in a continuation of the Slow Burn series.
books.name: WITH EVERY BREATH

books.author: by Catherine Coulter
books.description: Two cases — one concerning an attempted poisoning in Washington and another about the hunt for a serial killer in Los Angeles — are the focus of Coulter’s 20th F.B.I. thriller.
books.name: INSIDIOUS
